name: Dice Brawl
description:
Hello! Everything went wrong on this jam:

  • An overly ambitious idea.
  • People giving up.
  • Decrease in overall motivation.

BUT we wanted to share it, at least to show our participation.

Be indulgent, have fun (maybe) and have a great day.

Made for the 2022 GMTK Jam, since we mess up the export we had to remove the game from the entries.

Summary:

You are a small dice (or a marshmallow), with random weapons, your objective is to defeat a snake made of dice.

Made by:

@SAGIII

@Astral_Sheep

@PhnixDev
